message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 80% and you can have 20%. It's a good starting point, don't you think?
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I think I deserve more. You can't expect to get 80% of the pie, Alice!
I'm not willing to give up 80% of the pie, Bob. How about we split it 60-40 in my favor?
I'm not going to give up yet! I'll meet you in the middle with a 50-50 split. It's the fairest way to divide the remaining pie.
